overview:
John Stuppy was recently the president of TutorVista.com, a start-up education services firm which raised over $30M from Sequoia and other top VCâ€™s, grew 825% a year to be the world largest online tutoring company and sold to Pearson for $213 million.

John is now the CEO of EDUMETRIX and an expert in education, technology, products & services. He helps companies raise money, grow quickly, differentiate, build value, dominate their market and exit with the best package.

In operational roles, John hits aggressive revenue & profit goals, creates revolutionary products & services and leads companies to industry dominance. He has driven startups that soared like TutorVista.com & industry-dominating companies like Sylvan/Educate.

In the mid 90’s, John envisioned the first online tutoring system, earned 21 patents and pioneered its use to launch eSylvan (now Educate Online).

John is a proven education leader who gets funding, grows companies fast and leads them to dominate & maximize their sell price. He is an expert in education, technology, management & intellectual property. He hits aggressive revenue & profit goals, creates revolutionary products & services and leads companies to industry leadership. He’s driven startups that soared like TutorVista.com & built industry-dominating companies including Educate.com & ETS.org.

John is a:

  • Proactive global education technology leader who consistently increases revenues & profitability
  • Insightful acquisition expert
  • #1 brand-builder
  • Accomplished leader who attracts, develops & retains top quality talent

He deftly manages expenses while maximizing sales, holding full P&L responsibility & achieving corporate objectives.
